column2: "Solomon dze mfe duebiasa sii nankasa n’ahemfie no wiei."
"Na osii Lebanon kwaa dan no; ne tsentsen yɛ basafa eduonum
column3: na ne tɛtɛr basafa eduonu enum
column4: na no krɔn basafa duenum
column5: ɔwɔ nkyindur edum akyerɛpɛn anan do
column6: nye nkyindur mpuna gu edum no do."

column2: "Na wɔdze nkyindur saam sor wɔ mpuna eduanan enum a ogu edum no do no do; kyerɛpɛn kor mu duenum."
"Na ntokura akyerɛpɛn ebiasa wɔ hɔ
column3: na tokura hwɛ tokura enyim araa ban ebiasa."

column2: "Na mbobow na mpondua no nyinara yɛ nsamdo mpuna atweanan: na tokura hwɛ tokura enyim araa ban ebiasa."
"Na ɔyɛɛ edum abrandaa; ne tsentsen yɛ basafa eduonu enum
column3: na ne tɛtɛr yɛ basafa duenum; na abrandaa bi wɔ hɔn enyim
column4: na edum na mpuna durdur wɔ enyim."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ ahengua abrandaa mbrɛ obobu hɔ atsɛn
column3: mekyerɛ atsɛmbu abrandaa no a: na ɔdze nkyindur kataa do fi famu kodur nsamdo enyi."

column2: "Na ne fi mbrɛ ɔtse
column3: dampan kor no a ɔwɔ abrandaa no mu afamu no
column4: ne yɛbea tse dɛmara. Ɔyɛɛ dan so a ɔtse dɛ abrandaa yi maa Farao ne babaa

column2: "Iyinom nyinara yɛ abo a ɔsom bo
column3: mekyerɛ abo a woetwa woesusu no dɛ wɔdze nseradaa sianee
column4: no mu na n’ekyir
column5: mekyerɛ ofi fapem do kɛpem etsifi
column6: na dɛmara ɔdze fi ekyir afamu kodu pampan kɛse no do."

column2: "Na fapem no yɛ abo a ɔsom bo
column3: mekyerɛ abo akɛse a
column4: basafa enum enum abo

column2: "Na ɔsor abo a ɔsom bo
column3: mekyerɛ ɔbo a woesusu etwa na nkyindur dua."

column2: "Na dampan kɛse a ɔbɔ aprɔw no wɔ abo a wɔasen akyerɛpɛn ebiasa
column3: na nkyindur mpuna kyerɛpɛn kor; tse dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE ne dan no no mu afamu na ɔdan no n’abrandaa no tse."

column2: "Na ɔhen Solomon somae ma wɔkɛfaa Hiram fi Taere bae."
"Ɔyɛ Naftali ebusuakuw mu ɔbaa okunafo bi ne ba
column3: na n’egya nye ɔbarimba bi a ofi Taere
column4: boran odwimfo a; na nyansa na ntseasee na nyimdzee ahyɛ no ma
column5: dɛ ɔdze dzi boran dwuma nyinara mu edwin. Na ɔbaa ɔhen Solomon nkyɛn

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ boran edum ebien no
column3: kor ne tsentsen yɛ basafa akron; na ahoma basafa esia abɔ no ho aprɔw."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ boran ntaadotsir ebien dɛ wɔdze sisi edum no etsifi: ntaadotsir kor no krɔn yɛ basafa ebien nye fa
column3: na ntaadotsir kor so no krɔn yɛ basafa ebien nye fa."

column2: "Atena a wɔawen no dam dam
column3: na ntweaban kyinkyimii
column4: wɔ ntaadotsir a ɔwɔ edum no etsifi no ho; esuon wɔ ntaadotsir kor ho
column5: na esuon wɔ ntaadotsir kor so ho."

column2: "Nna ɔyɛɛ edum no; na ɔyɛɛ pɔmegranate eduaba akyerɛpɛn ebien twaa atenadwuma no kor ho hyiae
column3: dze kataa ntaadotsir no a ɔwɔ edum no etsifi no do: na dɛmara so na ɔyɛe maa ntaadotsir kor no so."

column2: "Na ntaadotsir a ɔwɔ abrandaa no mu edum no etsifi no wɔyɛɛ no nsukookoo dwuma
column3: basafa ebien."

column2: "Na edum ebien no do so wɔ ntaadotsir
column3: ɔbɛn efur a ɔwɔ atenadwuma no ho no ho: na pɔmegranate eduaba no yɛ ahaenu
column4: akyerɛpɛn akyerɛpɛn bɔ ntaadotsir kor no ho aprɔw."

column2: "Na ɔdze edum no sisii asɔrfi no n’abrandaa no ano: na ɔmaa enyimfa dum no do sii
column3: na ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Jakin: na ɔmaa abankum dum no do sii hɔ
column4: na ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Boaz."

column2: "Na edum no etsifi wɔ nsukookoo dwuma: dɛm na ɔdze wiee edum no edwuma no."
"Na ɔyɛɛ ogu po no a ofi ano kɛpem ano yɛ basafa enum no
column3: otwa kɔntɔnkrɔn
column4: na no krɔn yɛ basafa ebien nye fa: na ahoma basafa duenum bɔ ho aprɔw hyia."

column2: "Na nkukuduuduw wowɔ n’ano asease dze bɔ no aprɔw hyia
column3: ne tsentsen basafa enum bɔ po no ho aprɔw hyia: nkukuduuduw no a wogui no woguu no akyerɛpɛn ebien."

column2: "Ɔtaa anantwi duebien do
column3: ebiasa hwɛ kwaamu afamu
column4: na ebiasa hwɛ anee afamu
column6: na ebiasa hwɛ boka afamu: na po no taa hɔn do wɔ sor
column7: na hɔn ekyir nyinara wɔ no mu afamu."

column2: "Na ne peperepee yɛ nsatseama; na n’ano no wɔyɛɛ no dɛ kɔɔpow ano
column3: ɔtse dɛ nsukookoo ne nhyiren a ahan: odzi galɔn mpemdu."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ boran eguarsɛn ase ndaka du; adaka kor ne tsentsen yɛ basafa ebien
column3: na ne tɛtɛr yɛ basafa ebien
column4: na no krɔn yɛ basafa kor nye fa."

column2: "Na mbrɛ eguarsɛn ase ndaka no ne nyɛbea tse nye yi: wɔwowɔ nhyehyɛmu; na nhyehyɛmu no hyehyɛ ngua no ntamu:"
"na ngyata
column3: anantwi
column4: na kerubfo wowɔ ngua no ntamu nhyehyɛmu no do
column5: na ngyinado bi wɔ ngua no do ɔsor: na ngyata na anantwi no ase wɔ ahaban nkyekyeree a ɔsensɛn hɔ edwuma."

column2: "Na adaka biara wɔ boran ntwahonan anan
column3: na boran nhyehyɛmundua: na ne nan anan no wɔ nsusuomunsa: egurasɛn no ase na nsusuomunsa bi a woegu
column4: ka ahaban nkyekyeree ho wɔ ne nkyɛnkyɛn."

column2: "Na n’ano wɔ ntaadotsir no no mu na no do afamu yɛ anamɔn kor nye fa: na n’ano yɛ korkorba tse dɛ ngyinado dwuma bi
column3: bɛyɛ anamɔn ebien nye fa: na wodzidzii n’ano so edwin
column4: na ne nhyehyɛmu no yɛ etwaanan

column2: "Na ntwahonan anan no wowɔ nhyehyɛmu ntrɛtraba no ase; na ntwahonan no ne nhyɛmu ndua no hyehyɛ adaka no mu: na ntwahonan kor no krɔn yɛ anamɔn ebien nye fa."
"Na ntwahonan no ne nyɛbea tse dɛ tseaseanam ntwahonan nyɛbea: ne nhyɛmu ndua
column3: no ho nsusuomudze
column4: na ne hankra ano

column2: "Na nsusuomunsa anan wowɔ adaka kor no kutuw anan no ho: adaka no ara mu na no nsusuomunsa no wɔ."
"Na adaka no n’etsifi no wɔyɛɛ no korkorba a no krɔn yɛ bɛyɛ anamɔn kor hyia: na adaka no n’etsifi na ne nsa na ne nhyehyɛmu ntrɛtraba no a ofi kor no ara mu no wɔ."
"Na odzii ne nsa ne ntɛrba
column3: na ne nhyehyɛmu ntrɛtraba no do edwin
column4: kerubfo ngyata na mbɛdua
column5: dɛ mbrɛ kor ne ntamu tse

column2: "Ndaka du no mbrɛ ɔyɛe no nye yi: ne nyinara wɔ gubea kor
column3: nsusui kor
column4: na isu kor."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ boran eguarsɛn du: eguarsɛn kor dzi galɔn ahaanan: na eguarsɛn biara yɛ basafa ebien: na eguarsɛn kor wɔ ndaka du no mu kor biara no do."
"Na ɔdze ndaka no sisii
column3: enum wɔ ɔdan no n’enyimfa afamu
column4: na enum so wɔ ɔdan no n’abankum afamu: na ɔdze po no sii ɔdan no ne nyimfa afamu wɔ boka afamu a ɔhwɛ pomu afamu no."

column2: "Na Hiram yɛɛ eguarsɛn
column3: na nsofi
column4: na mbɛɛsen no. Nna Hiram wiee edwuma a ɔyɛe maa ɔhen Solomon wɔ EWURADZE ne fi no ho nyinara yɛ:"

column2: "edum ebien no
column3: na edum no n’etsifi ntaadotsir apɔw ebien no; na ntenadwuma ebien no a wɔdze kataa edum no n’etsifi ntaadotsir apɔw ebien no ho no;"

column2: "na ntenadwuma ebien no ho pɔmegranate eduaba ahaanan no; pɔmegranate eduaba akyerɛpɛn ebien yɛ atenadwuma kor nedze
column3: dɛ ɔkata ntaadotsir no n’apɔw ebien no a ɔwɔ edum no no do no ho;"

column2: "na ndaka du no
column3: na ndaka no do eguarsɛn du no;"

column2: "na po kor no
column3: na po no n’ase anantwi duebien no;"

column2: "na asɛn
column3: na nsofi
column4: na mbɛɛsen no: mekyerɛ ndzɛmba yi nyinara a Hiram yɛe maa ɔhen Solomon
column5: wɔ EWURADZE ne fi no ho no

column2: "Jordan Tɛtɛr no do na ɔhen no gui
column3: wɔ hyirew daadze mu wɔ Sukɔt na Zaretan ntamu."

column2: "Na Solomon gyaa ndzɛmba no nyinara ker
column3: osiandɛ ɔso dodow mbordo: woennhu boran no ne nkerii ano."

column2: "Na Solomon yɛɛ ndzɛmba no a ɔwɔ EWURADZE ne fie no mu no nyinara: sika afɔrmbukyia no
column3: na ɔpon no a kyerɛpaanoo no si do no
column4: sika;"

column2: "na nkandzeadua no
column3: enum wɔ enyimfa afamu
column4: na enum so wɔ abankum

column2: "na mpokuwa
column3: na nsompokuwa
column4: na mbɛɛsen
column7: sika mapa; na no mu afamu ɔdan no
column10: mekyerɛ asɔrfi no ho mbobow no ho apontsɛr so sika a."

column2: "Na wowiee edwuma a ɔhen Solomon yɛe no wɔ EWURADZE ne fie no ho no nyinara yɛ. Na Solomon dze ndzɛmba a n’egya David tui sii hɔ no
column3: mekyerɛ dwetɛ
column4: na sika
column6: na ɔdze besisii EWURADZE fie ndzekoradzebea no mu."
